judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Stadtfeld. Costs to be paid by appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Fred O. Eiebort, of Thomas & Kiebort, for appellants.
Q. Wayne Altenburg, for appellee, was not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Cramm’s Estate.
Argued March 21, 1938.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Fred O. Eiebort, of Thomas & Kiebort, for appellants.
Q. Wayne Altenburg, for appellee, was not heard.
April 18, 1938:
